description: Try our easy to follow Ham, Spinach & Egg Nests recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Baked eggs,Ham,Low saturated fat,High fibre,High protein,Christmas,Egg,Tomato,Low sugar,Spinach
name: Ham, Spinach & Egg Nests Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Lightly grease 4 large muffin pan moulds and line base with baking paper.
Place spinach leaves into a bowl. Cover with boiling water and stand for 1 minute. Drain and cool. Squeeze liquid from spinach with your hands. Finely chop.

Use 4 slices of ham to line each muffin mould, overlapping slightly, forming a nest. Spoon spinach into ham moulds. Top with chopped tomatoes. Break an egg into each mould. Season with sea salt flakes and freshly ground black pepper.
Bake for 15-20 minutes or until egg is cooked. Remove nests from muffin moulds. Serve with toast and extra spinach leaves.
